game.name: Cational Meographic
game.shortDescription: Cational Meographic is the digital adaptation of the board game of the same name. You will embark on a hiking adventure, completing various photo missions by placing different landscape tiles and accumulating Pawints. You can unlock additional challenge modes and push your Pawints to new heights.
